options: -1:SEED_ngcQuickStart:A time traveler with a Wolf-class frigate and a Kite-class shuttle (instant start)

script:
NGCAddShip wolf_Starting
NGCAddShip kite_Starting
AddTextSmall "Acquired level 1 officer" good
SetTextHighlights "level 1 officer"
$ngcAddOfficer = true
NGCSetDifficulty normal
$ngcSkipTutorial = true
NGCSetWithTimePass false
NGCSetStartingLocation Duzahk -2650 3250
NGCAddStandardStartingScript
NGCDone
